name: Carrying Capacity
description: Creature Size Carry Drag/Lift/Push Tiny Str. × 7.5 lb. Str. × 15 lb. Small/Medium Str. × 15 lb. Str. × 30 lb. Large Str. × 30 lb. Str. × 60 lb. Huge Str. × 60 lb. Str. × 120 lb. Gargantuan Str. × 120 lb. Str. × 240 lb.
